title: 10 tickets per day?
body:
Am I reading the event wrong? I thought we would be receiving 10 tickets a day for our first win but I have not received them for any of the days.


Daily Missions

Mission 1
Win one matchmade game
Reward: 10 Tickets

replies.body: Those daily missions are tied to the Arcade Passes. After buying either one you will start receiving those daily missions.

Did you buy one of the [passes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-arcade-boss-world-event)for the event?  That is the only way to get access to the daily mission.
Why not just give everyone the missions for free?
Everyone **_does _**get access to the first 2 missions lines involving Blitzcrank and Veigar for free though!
Only the Blitz and veigar yes. Is it possible to put the other missions up for purchase with IP?
wasting IP on runes and rune pages are not worth it anymore
